summary: A teleport spell. Similar to \"Mark and Recall\" from Morrowind.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://s7.postimage.org/b6ae1gl97/head.png[/img]
Similar to \"Mark and Recall\" from Morrowind.[/center]

* OVERVIEW *
This mod grants you the option to drop an item and then teleport back to it using a custom spell.

* HOW IT WORKS *
First of all go to Riverwood to take the platform gear and the spelltome to learn the magic.

- Mode 1 -
Quick Example : Move to Witherun at the Skyforge (random place) then drop the teleport platform there.
Once done that travel to Windhelm or anywhere you like, buy some sweetrolls (optional)
and get back to Skyforge just casting the spell (you will appear exactly where you dropped the item
and you will be also able to retreive it)

- Mode 2 -
Put the Teleport Platform in your inventory and cast the spell. A menu with options appears ;)

* INSTALLATION *
Place the ESP and BSA in the data folder and then activate the ESP through the menu launcher.

* UNINSTALLATION *
Just delete the ESP and BSA

* BUGS *
Please report to me if you find bugs. Thank you.

And, please, endorse me if you like my mod.

Enjoy!
author: MannyGT

files.name: Mannys Teleport Spell 1_1
files.changelogHtml: Remove the flag "respawn" to the spelltome and teleport platform :-/

files.name: Mannys Teleport Spell 1_2
files.changelogHtml: When the teleport platform is in your inventory, a menu options appears
